column1: * The [[Third Kinslaying]]: the remaining [[Sons of Fëanor
column2: sons]] of [[Fëanor]], desiring the [[Silmaril]], attack the remnants of [[Doriath]] and [[Gondolin]] at the [[Mouths of Sirion

column1: * [[Círdan]] and [[Gil-galad]] send aid to the Havens. The arrive too late and the people are defeated; the refugees move to the [[Isle of Balar]].<ref name="Earendil">{{S
* [[Elrond]] and [[Elros]] are taken captive by [[Maglor]], but Maglor comes to love the boys and fosters them.<ref name="Earendil"/>
* [[Elwing]], bearing the Silmaril, casts herself into [[Belegaer
column2: the sea]]. [[Ulmo]] bears her up in the likeness of a swan and she finds [[Eärendil]].<ref name="Years"/>
